answers.answer: Yeah, she's sick and needs to see a vet.  :-)  Many animals will try to hide in a den when they're very ill or dying.  Please don't waste time trying to figure this one out on your own.  You need a vet.

I AGREE WITH JAYBAY. YOU DEFINETLY NEED TO GET HER TO A VET ASAP!!! MY BICHON FRISE WAS ACTING THE SAME WAY. TURNS OUT SHE HAD SUGAR DIABETES! SHE NOW TAKES INSULIN SHOTS TWICE A DAY AND NOW WE HAVE OUR LOVABLE LIVELY DOG BACK. NOT THAT YOUR DOG WILL HAVE SAME THING, BUT THAT JUST SHOWS HOW IMPORTANT IT IS TO A VET. MINE COULD'VE DIE FROM EITHER GOING INT SHOCK OR DYING FROM HAVING A SEIZURE OR GOING INT CONVULSIONS. PLUS IT GAVE HIM BACK HIS QUALITY OF LIFE. I WISH YOU WELL AND YOUR PET. IF THE VET CAN'T FIND A DIAGNOSIS ASK HIM TO DO A GLUCOSE LEVEL. GOOD LUCK! WOULD LOVE TO KNOW HOW SHE'S DOING.

question: All she wants to do is lay there. She wont eat, walk, My friend had to drag her out from under the house today, she will take her vitamins but thats the only thing that she has ate in about 2 days.. any help?
title: My dog is not wanting to do ANYTHING
